name: Yaswanth Kummetha
bio: Associate Lead Data Scientist with 6+ years of experience in Data Science, Data Engineering and Analytics. Google certified TensorFlow Developer with expertise in ML, DL, NLP and building interactive applications. Graduate from IIT Kanpur. When not building ML models, I enjoy the world of Pok√©mon, rewatching F.R.I.E.N.D.S, and exploring the wizarding world of Harry Potter.

projects.title: All Things ML
projects.description: Comprehensive machine learning platform featuring interactive tools for ML, Deep Learning, and NLP tasks. Includes classification, regression, clustering algorithms with visual demonstrations and hands-on learning experiences.
highlights: Interactive ML algorithm demonstrations
Visual data exploration tools
Real-time model training and evaluation
Educational platform for ML concepts

projects.title: GnanaVriksha - Data Science Quiz Platform
projects.description: Comprehensive interactive quiz platform with 1000+ questions across Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Generative AI, Computer Vision, and NLP. Features agent-generated topics and questions with progressive difficulty, detailed explanations, and performance analytics. Built with Streamlit and modern UI design.
highlights: 1000+ questions across 5 major DS domains with 38 specialized subtopics
Agent-based topic and question generation system
Progressive learning path with difficulty-ordered subtopics (STR values)
Real-time performance analytics with trend visualization
Detailed explanations for both correct and incorrect answers
Randomized questions and shuffled options for unique experiences
Modern purple-themed UI with responsive design
Comprehensive coverage: ML algorithms, Deep Learning, Gen AI, Computer Vision, NLP

projects.title: Swara - Speech Processing App
projects.description: Multilingual speech-to-text and text-to-speech web application built with Flask. Supports real-time voice transcription and natural speech synthesis in multiple languages including English, Telugu, Arabic, and Spanish.
highlights: Real-time speech-to-text conversion
Multilingual support (English, Telugu, Arabic, Spanish)
Text-to-speech with customizable speed
Audio file upload and processing
Clean, responsive web interface

projects.title: ComicGen - AI Comic Generation System
projects.description: Automated 6-panel comic generation system using ComfyUI workflows and Flux-Kontext AI model. Maintains character consistency across all panels by using a reference T-pose image as the foundation. Creates narrative sequences from template JSON files with custom prompts, perfect for storytelling and character development.
highlights: Character consistency maintained across all 6 panels using T-pose reference
Flux-Kontext AI model for advanced image generation
Template-based workflow system with JSON configuration
Automated workflow generation from story prompts
Perfect for narrative sequences and character development
Supports complex storytelling scenarios (e.g., Hogwarts sorting)
ComfyUI integration for professional AI art generation
